class pulse.api.Commit(resource, version)¶

Bases: pulse.api.PulseDbObject

Object created when a resource has been published to database The commit is the versioned

class pulse.api.CommitProduct(parent, product_type)¶

Bases: pulse.api.PulseDbObject, pulse.api.Product

Product which has been published to database

download()¶

download the product to local pulse cache :return: the product’s local filepath

register_to_user_products()¶

register the product to the user local products list

remove_from_user_products(recursive_clean=False)¶

remove the product from local pulse cache will raise a pulse error if the product is used by a resource will raise an error if the product’s folder is locked by the filesystem

unregister_to_user_products()¶

unregister the product to the user local products list

class pulse.api.Product(parent, product_type)¶

abstract class for all products

add_product_user(user_directory)¶

add a local resource or product as product’s user :param user_directory: the resource path

get_product_users()¶

return the list of local resources or product using this product :return: resources filepath list

get_unused_time()¶

return the time since the local product has not been used by any resource or product. Mainly used to purge local products from pulse’s cache :return: time value

remove_product_user(user_directory)¶

remove the specified local resource or product from the product’s user :param user_directory: the resource path

class pulse.api.PulseDbObject(project, uri)¶

abstract class for all objects which need to save persistent data

db_create()¶

initialize the object in database

use all the attributes lists in ._storage.vars and save them to the DB the key is the uri raise DbError if the object already exists

db_read()¶

read all object attributes from database.

Will pass if the database have an attribute missing on the object :return: PulseDbObject :rtype: PulseDbObject

metas = None¶

Store custom attributes, passed to repository - dict

project = None¶

the project this object rely to - Project

uri = None¶

universal resource identifier - string
